pr_title: Add beacon block hash tree root benchmarks

timeline.message: Add beacon block hash tree root benchmarks

timeline.bodyHTML:
I would also add this annotation to get more precise results

Suggested change
@Warmup(iterations = 5, time = 1000, timeUnit = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
@Warmup(iterations = 5, time = 1000, timeUnit = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
@OutputTimeUnit(TimeUnit.MICROSECONDS)

You may also annotate the whole class to not duplicate params for every method
timeline.author: Nashatyrev

timeline.message: Put annotations on top of class decleration
